actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on  Rules, H. Rept. 95-795.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the conference report on H. R. 7555, a bill making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, and Health, Education, and Welfare, and related agencies.

summary.text: Authorizes the consideration of the conference report and the amendment reported from conference in disagreement on H.R. 7555 (Appropriations for Departments of Labor, and Health, Education, and Welfare).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the conference report on H. R. 7555, a bill making appropriations for the Departments of Labor, and Health, Education, and Welfare, and related agencies.
